title: Bob and 6 more Christmas Stories
description: The winsome tale of Bob opens this board book of seven Boynton Christmas stories. Using the delightful tabs, little children can choose the story they want to hear.Stories Bob * Merry Christmas Party * The Star * A Big Box * Eight Wishes * Wake Up! * Christmas LullabyGuided by the colorful picture tabs, every perfectly silly selection is just right for snuggling by, all December long. And highly approved by Bob.I have a tiny reindeer.He says his name is Bob .He like to entertain me.He says it is his job.
author: Sandra Boynton
